20110107163526.000|20110107163528.000|CC1|AT THE NEW JERSEY DECORATING    
20110107163528.000|20110107163530.000|CC1|EXCHANGE, IN THE TOWN OF RIVER  
20110107163530.000|20110107163532.000|CC1|EDGE, CUSTOMERS USUALLY SHOP    
20110107163532.000|20110107163534.000|CC1|UNTIL THEY DROP.                
20110107163534.000|20110107163535.000|CC1|NOT TODAY.

20110107163537.000|20110107163540.000|CC1|SHOWROOM BY DESIGN.             
20110107163540.000|20110107163544.000|CC1|TO SEE HOW SHOPPERS WILL REACT
